content: the pemberley pullover description this beginner friendly v-neck pullover is the perfect staple to your winter wardrobe the boxy and slightly oversized fit makes it super comfy to wear this pattern is available free on my blog 1 this pattern is available as a kit on lionbrand com 2 it comes with the digital pdf pattern + all the yarn needed to make your sweater you can even customize your color choice i have a full video tutorial for the pemberley pullover 3 check it out on my youtube channel 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-pemberley-pullover-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/2sdyc 3 https //youtu be/hoirmmtawru
